settings.title: Rewards Program
settings.subheading: Flexfilm is making it easier and more rewarding to order window tint. You can earn points toward discounts and free products.

settings.text: With the Flexfilm rewards program, we are making it easier and more rewarding to order window tint. You can earn points toward discounts and free products, such as a heat box, tools, shirts, banners, and more.

settings.title: How To Redeem Points
settings.text: After you've accumulated some points, visit the rewards dashboard to view all the ways you can redeem your points at Flexfilm. After you've found an item you want, just follow the prompts to redeem your item and add it to your cart.

settings.title: How do I sign up for your rewards program?
settings.text: Create a new account or login to your current account. In the lower right click the button “Get Rewarded” or click here to open up the rewards dashboard.

settings.title: How do I get 60% off a plotter?
settings.text: Join our rewards program and earn 5,000 points to reach the Lightweight VIP tier to unlock you discount code to take 60% off a plotter. Once you reach Feather Lightweight, you will find the discount code in the rewards dashboard and in your email. Sign up or login to our rewards program here.

settings.title: How do I view my points balance?
settings.text: Create a new account or login to your current account. In the lower right click the button “Get Rewarded” or click here to open up the rewards dashboard. At the top of the panel you will see your points balance.

settings.title: How do I earn points?
settings.text: You earn points in a variety of ways. Creating an account is the easiest way. Placing an order earns you 1 point for every $1 spent. You can also celebrate your birthday, share us on Facebook, like us on Facebook, or follow us on Instagram for additional points.

settings.title: How do I redeem my points?
settings.text: Create a new account or login to your current account. In the lower right click the button “Get Rewarded” or click here to open up the rewards dashboard. Click “Ways to redeem” to view all the rewards. Click “View” on the item you want then click “Redeem.” You will then be presented with a discount code in the rewards dashboard as well as in an automatic email. Input this discount code on the payment screen during checkout. Only one discount code can be used per order.

settings.title: What can I redeem my points for?
settings.text: You can redeem your points for tools, discounts, displays, FlexCut software subscription, a heat box, and more. Create a new account or login to your current account. In the lower right click the button “Get Rewarded” or click here to open up the rewards dashboard. Click "Ways to redeem" to view items you can redeem your points for.

settings.title: Do my points have an expiration date?
settings.text: Reward points will start to expire after 1 year (365 days). After this date, all unredeemed points will expire on a rolling basis for customers who have no engaged in points activity for 1 year (365 days) or more.

settings.title: How do I view my VIP tier placement, rewards, and perks?
settings.text: Create a new account or login to your current account. In the lower right click the button “Get Rewarded” or click here to open up the rewards dashboard. Click “Your Rewards” at the top of the panel to view your rewards. Alternatively, scroll down to the VIP section of the rewards dashboard. Click the arrow to the right of the VIP tier to view more information about your status in the VIP program. Click the arrow next to each tier to view the rewards and perks of each VIP tier.

settings.title: How do I get added to your installer locator map?
settings.text: Enroll in our rewards program by creating a new account or access your current account by logging in. Accumulate 5,000 points to reach the Lightweight tier then fill out this application.

settings.title: When will I receive my reward points?
settings.text: Typically points will appear in your rewards account instantly.

settings.title: Can you transfer points and tier status between accounts?
settings.text: Unfortunately we are unable to transfer points or grant tier access between accounts. Accounts cannot be merged so any points earned on an account will remain on that account and cannot be merged or transferred. If you forgot your password, reset your password here.

settings.title: Can I use my rewards coupon codes and other discount codes together on one order?
settings.text: Our system is limited to one coupon/discount code per order. If you redeem your points for multiple items, you will need to use each coupon code on separate orders. For example, you can't use a coupon code for a free pen and a $5 off discount code on the same order.

settings.title: I forgot to input my code during checkout. What do I do?
settings.text: Unfortunately we are unable to apply your coupon/discount code after the order is placed.
